name: Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Tetris
storyline:
On a distant and mysterious island, the evil Dr. Robotnik was immersed in his most perverse experiments. Determined to create the ultimate weapon to conquer the world, he manipulated the very essence of time and space. However, an unexpected error in his experiment caused a dimensional rift, giving rise to an evil double of himself.

Now the island is in chaos. The evil Badniks, created by Dr. Robotnik, are bewildered and can't tell the real Dr. Robotnik from the impostor. To find the true leader, the Badniks hold an enigmatic "Mean Bean Tetris" contest. Only the original Dr. Robotnik, with his cunning and skills, will be able to prove that he is the real one.

Get ready for the most frantic block battle in Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Tetris! Join Dr. Robotnik and his gang of evil Beans in an exciting Tetris challenge packed with action and strategy.
summary: Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Tetris is a fan game where, after causing a dimensional rift and giving rise to an evil double of himself, the Badniks hold an enigmatic "Mean Bean Tetris" contest. Only the original Dr. Robotnik, with his cunning and skills, will be able to prove that he is the real one.
